message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be extremely valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm confident it could be even more valuable to you.  I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $2000000.  This is a significant opportunity, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your company. Let me know if you're interested in learning more.
